כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַ֭יּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> Hai-yom me all the day חֵרְפ֣וּנִי <S%H2778><s%> che-re-Fu-ni reproach אוֹיְבָ֑י <S%H341><s%> 'oy-Vai; Mine enemies מְ֝הוֹלָלַ֗י <S%H1984><s%> me-ho-la-Lai, [and] they that are mad בִּ֣י bi נִשְׁבָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba-'u. against me are sworn

יָ֭מַי <S%H3117><s%> Ya-mai My days כְּצֵ֣ל <S%H6738><s%> ke-Tzel [are] like a shadow נָט֑וּי <S%H5186><s%> na-Tui; that declineth וַ֝אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni, I כָּעֵ֥שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> ka-'E-sev like grass אִיבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H3001><s%> 'i-Vash. and I am withered
